page.title: 11PETS
page.content: Pets in Newbridge area The most popular dog is the mongrel because lots of dogs wonder around and mate with a different breed of dog. The most unpopular dog is the labrador because it takes up a lot of room.The labrador also needs lots of exercise.Another unpopular dog is the Alsatian. The most popular dog food is Chum and the most popular cat food is Whiskers. Dogs are the most popular pet because they are good companions,especially for old people who are living alone. There is a Â£50 fine for allowing dogs to foul pavements and parks.Another popular pet is Tropical Fish because they do not make much noise and just need to be fed and their tanks cleaned.
